long_description: Designed for sport, ready for anything! Injinji Sport 2.0 socks help harness your foot's natural mechanics, resulting in an enhanced tactile feel of your environment and an increased sense of balance. 5-toe design helps align toes properly to aid correct posture and balance. Injinji Sport 2.0 socks help prevent blisters and hot spots. CoolMax(R) fabric blend wicks moisture, dries quickly and breathes well, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of cool, dry feet. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Designed for sport, ready for anything! Injinji Sport 2.0 socks help harness your foot's natural mechanics, resulting in an enhanced tactile feel of your environment and an increased sense of balance.
